title: My Friend cant join a game
body:
Ok, so today when I tried to play a game with my friend (I was the leader) we got into champ select and after it should have went into a game I was put into the loading screen but my friend was not, and his client said "Reconnect" and when he clicked the button for a second it said "teleporting into a game" then the reconnect button came back. Please help! if you want more info on the issue I will tell you
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: It sounds like your friend is having some connection blocks that are preventing him from connecting to the game.  Have him try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, but to test it in a custom game!
Ok thanks I will have him try it next time I see him
